Trigger.name: Curing status gate
Trigger.script: --also generate the settings map ori.ssc.map = {} for setting, data in pairs(ori.ssc.data) do ori.ssc.map[data.curingStatus] = setting end

regexCodeList.string: Curing Status:
return true

Trigger.name: Capture settings
Trigger.script: local setting = ori.ssc.map[matches[2]] if not setting then return end if ori.ssc.data[setting].type == "boolean" then --this one just had to be special didn't it >:( local value = (matches[3] == "Yes" or matches[3] == "Transmutation") ori.ssc.settings[setting] = value elseif ori.ssc.data[setting].type == "int" then ori.ssc.settings[setting] = matches[3]:match("%d+") elseif ori.ssc.data[setting].type == "string" then ori.ssc.settings[setting] = matches[3]:lower() end

Trigger.name: Close trigger
Trigger.script: setTriggerStayOpen("Curing status gate", 0) disableTrigger("ori curing status gag")

Trigger.name: Priority set
Trigger.script:
local naughtyCharacters = {"%(","%)"} local aff, prio = matches[2], tonumber(matches[3]) for _, char in pairs(naughtyCharacters) do aff = aff:gsub(char,"") end ori.ssc.prios[aff] = prio
if ori.ssc.gaggingPriorities or ori.settings.priorityGags then deleteFull() else selectCurrentLine() replace("") ori.echo(aff.." set to priority "..prio) end

Trigger.name: Defense priority tracking
Trigger.script: local defense = matches[2] local prio = tonumber(matches[3]) if prio == 0 then ori.defense.priorities[defense] = nil else ori.defense.priorities[defense] = prio end if ori.settings.priorityGags then deleteFull() end

Trigger.name: Predictions
Trigger.script: local affs = string.split(matches[2]:gsub(" and ",", "):gsub(",,",","),", ") ori.ssc.predictions = {} for _, aff in pairs(affs) do ori.ssc.predictions[aff] = true end if ori.settings.priorityGags then deleteFull() end

regexCodeList.string: ^You are predicting that you have the (.+) afflictions\.$

Trigger.name: Eat
Trigger.script:
local balanceless = { quartz = true, potash = true, dolomite = true, azurite = true, echinacea = true, skullcap = true, kola = true, cohosh = true, gypsyum = true, irid = true, bisemutum = true, myrrh = true, calcite = true, } local herb = matches[2] if not balanceless[herb] then ori.balance.lost("eat") ori.ssc.usedCure() end ori.lastEaten = herb ori.outr[herb] = math.max(0, ori.outr[herb] - 1)
if ori.outrTimer then killTimer(ori.outrTimer) end ori.outrTimer = tempTimer(0, ori.prec.precache)

Trigger.name: Mounted
Trigger.script: ori.mounted = true if not mmp.settings.gallop and ori.settings.autoGallop then mmp.settings:setOption("gallop", true) end

regexCodeList.string: ^You easily vault onto the back of (.+)\.$
^You climb up on (.+)\.$
You must dismount before you can mount anything else.

Trigger.name: Dismounted
Trigger.script: ori.mounted = false if mmp.settings.gallop and ori.settings.autoGallop then mmp.settings:setOption("gallop", false) end

regexCodeList.string: ^You step down off of (.+)\.$
^You lose purchase on (.+)\.$
^\w+ waves \w+ palm in your direction, and you can only watch as your surroundings dissolve and fade from existence\.$
^You feel your blessed soul drawn toward \w+ as you are delivered out of harm's way\.$
^\w+ steps into the attack, grabs your arm, and throws you violently to the ground\.$
^You feel a strong tug in the pit of your stomach\. Your surroundings dissolve into the featureless swirl of the ether, resolving once more into a recognisable landscape as you land before \w+\.$
You are not currently riding anything.
You are not currently riding that.
You must be mounted to trample.
You are thrown from the room by the sheer force of the fiery blast.
You're drawn screaming into its hellish maw.
The ring of shining metal carries you up into the skies.
You clamber off of your mount.
You need to be riding a proper mount to gallop.
You call upon your dark power, and instantly a black wind descends upon you. In seconds your body begins to dissipate, and you are one with the odious vapour.
You vaguely make out a large, square doorway of light and you step through it.
With an ear-splitting roar, you rear back your draconic head and scream out your triumph.
^As you rub one hand over a petite ceramic urn, the air in front of you warps and changes as (.+) coalesces.$

Trigger.name: Ret check
Trigger.script: if ori.affs.aeon then return end if not ori.affs.retardation then ori.echo("Assuming retardation") ori.affs.retardation = true ori.quietSend("curing batch off") end if ori.retTimer then killTimer(ori.retTimer) end ori.retTimer = tempTimer( 5, function() ori.echo("Assuming we're out of retardation") ori.affs.retardation = false ori.quietSend("curing batch on") end )

regexCodeList.string: You move sluggishly into action.
An (ice)wall is here, blocking passage to the (\w+)\.
A scorching wall of (fire) stands here, blocking passage to the (\w+)\.
A large wall of (thorn)s stands here, barring passage to the (\w+)\.
A large wall of (stone) stands here, blocking passage to the (\w+)\.
(\w+) \((open|closed) door\)

Trigger.name: Grab the peeps
Trigger.script:
local location = matches.location ~= "" and matches.location or "Gemmed or off Plane" local possibleRooms = mmp.searchRoomExact(location) local area if table.size(possibleRooms)>0 then area = getRoomAreaName(getRoomArea(next(possibleRooms))) --let's just grab the first room and pick that area. if area == -1 then area = "Unknown area" end else area = "Unknown area" end ori.ndb.qwhom[area] = ori.ndb.qwhom[area] or {} ori.ndb.qwhom[area][location] = ori.ndb.qwhom[area][location] or {} table.insert(ori.ndb.qwhom[area][location], matches.person)
if not ori.ndb.db[matches.person] then ori.ndb.query(matches.person) end
deleteLine()

regexCodeList.string: ^\((?<location>Embracing Death)\) (?<person>\w+)\.$

Trigger.name: Souls
Trigger.script:
local area = "Souls" local location = matches[3] or "unknown" local person = matches[2] ori.ndb.qwhom[area] = ori.ndb.qwhom[area] or {} ori.ndb.qwhom[area][location] = ori.ndb.qwhom[area][location] or {} table.insert(ori.ndb.qwhom[area][location], matches.person)
if not ori.ndb.db[matches.person] then ori.ndb.query(matches.person) end
deleteLine()

Trigger.name: Total peeps
Trigger.script: disableTrigger("Orion qwhom") deleteLine() for area, rooms in spairs(ori.ndb.qwhom) do if not ori.ndb.qwhomFilter or area:lower():match(ori.ndb.qwhomFilter:lower()) then ori.newLine() cecho("<medium_orchid>[<dodger_blue>" .. area .. "<medium_orchid>]") for room, people in spairs(rooms) do cecho("\n <steel_blue>[") local possibleRooms = mmp.searchRoomExact(room) if table.size(possibleRooms) == 1 then local vnum = next(possibleRooms) cechoPopup( "<u><medium_turquoise>" .. room .. "</u>", { function() mmp.gotoRoom(vnum) end, function() centerview(vnum) end, }, {"Go to " .. vnum, "Center map on " .. vnum}, true ) else cecho("<light_blue>" .. room) end cecho("<steel_blue>] (<light_cyan>" .. #people .. "<steel_blue>): ") table.sort(people) for index, person in spairs(people) do people[index] = "<" .. (ori.ndb.getColor(person) or "grey") .. ">" .. person end cecho(table.concat(people, ", ")) end end end

Trigger.name: Grab server timestamps
Trigger.script: ori.serverTime = multimatches[2][2] --Mostly for prompt displays, probably a pain to code with because this updates off a prompt trigger.

Trigger.name: Orion Prompt
Trigger.script: if not ori.loaded then return end ori.illusion = false enableTrigger("The Illusion Box") disableTrigger("Orion walls") --this trigger will only be active between gmcp.Room.Info and prompt. disableTrigger("Orion doors") --this is stuff for helping track hidden affs ori.ssc.recentAffs = {} ori.defense.recentlyGained = {} ori.defense.recentlyLost = {} if getCurrentLine() ~= "ERROR: invalid line number" then ori.prompt.custom() end ori.core()

Trigger.name: NDB honors
Trigger.script: if ori.ndb.honoring and ori.ndb.db[ori.ndb.honoring] and multimatches[1][2]:find(ori.ndb.honoring) then ori.ndb.correctPerson = true end

regexCodeList.string: ^(.+) \((?:female|male|non\-binary) .+\)\.$

Trigger.name: Close NDB honors
Trigger.script: disableTrigger("NDB honors gag") setTriggerStayOpen("NDB honors", 0) if ori.ndb.correctPerson then ori.ndb.correctPerson = false ori.ndb.generateHighlight(ori.ndb.honoring) if ori.ndb.db[ori.ndb.honoring].city == "hidden" then ori.ndb.db[ori.ndb.honoring].city = "none" --we still didn't find a city for em, setting it to none. end local index = table.index_of(ori.ndb.hidden, ori.ndb.honoring) if index then table.remove(ori.ndb.hidden, index) end ori.ndb.generateHighlight(ori.ndb.honoring) ori.ndb.honoring = nil if #ori.ndb.hidden > 0 then ori.ndb.honors(ori.ndb.hidden[1], true) end end

regexCodeList.string: return true

Trigger.name: City capture
Trigger.script: if ori.ndb.correctPerson then ori.ndb.db[ori.ndb.honoring].city = matches[2]:lower() end

regexCodeList.string: ^\w+ is an? .+ in (Hashan|Eleusis|Mhaldor|Ashtan|Cyrene|Targossas)\.$

Trigger.name: Army rank
Trigger.script: if ori.ndb.correctPerson then ori.ndb.db[ori.ndb.honoring].army = matches[2] end

regexCodeList.string: ^\w+ is a .+\((\d+)\) in the army of (\w+)\.$

Trigger.name: City Enemies
Trigger.script:
if multimatches[2][1]:find("Enemies of") and ( multimatches[2][1]:find("of Targossas") or multimatches[2][1]:find("of Mhaldor") or multimatches[2][1]:find("of Hashan") or multimatches[2][1]:find("of Cyrene") or multimatches[2][1]:find("of Ashtan") or multimatches[2][1]:find("of Eleusis") ) then local enemies = string.split(multimatches[4][1],", ") ori.ndb.cityEnemies = {} for _, person in pairs(enemies) do ori.ndb.cityEnemies[person] = true end
table.save(ori.filepath .. "/cityEnemies", ori.ndb.cityEnemies) ori.echo("Updated city enemies") end

Alias.name: Ori priogags
Alias.script: if matches[2] == "on" then ori.changeSetting("priorityGags", true) elseif matches[2] == "off" then ori.changeSetting("priorityGags", false) else ori.changeSetting("priorityGags", not ori.settings.priorityGags) end

Alias.name: Eat for deathsight/thirdeye
Alias.script: local def = matches[2]:lower() if matches[3] == "on" then ori.changeSetting(def.."Eat", true) elseif matches[2] == "off" then ori.changeSetting(def.."Eat", false) else ori.changeSetting(def.."Eat", not ori.settings[def.."Eat"]) end

Alias.name: ori lustlist add/remove person
Alias.script: local person = matches[3]:lower() if matches[2]:lower() == "add" then if table.contains(ori.settings.lustList, person) then ori.echo(person:title().." is already on the lust whitelist!") else table.insert(ori.settings.lustList, person) ori.echo("Added "..person:title().." to the lust whitelist.") end else if table.contains(ori.settings.lustList, person) then table.remove(ori.settings.lustList, table.index_of(ori.settings.lustList, person)) ori.echo("Removed "..person:title().." from the lust whitelist!") else ori.echo(person:title().." wasn't on the lust whitelist!") end end ori.echo("People on your lustlist: "..table.concat(ori.settings.lustList, ", ")) ori.saveSettings()

Alias.name: Hiddenchecks
Alias.script: if matches[2] == "on" then ori.changeSetting("hiddenChecks", true) elseif matches[2] == "off" then ori.changeSetting("hiddenChecks", false) else ori.changeSetting("hiddenChecks", not ori.settings.hiddenChecks) end

Alias.name: Autoreject toggle
Alias.script: if matches[2] == "on" then ori.changeSetting("autoReject", true) elseif matches[2] == "off" then ori.changeSetting("autoReject", false) else ori.changeSetting("autoReject", not ori.settings.hiddenChecks) end

Alias.name: Mountlist
Alias.script: if not tonumber(matches[3]) then ori.echo("You need to enter an ID for the mount to "..matches[2]) return end local mount = matches[3] if matches[2]:lower() == "add" then if table.contains(ori.settings.mountList, mount) then ori.echo(mount.." is already in your mount list") else table.insert(ori.settings.mountList, mount) ori.echo("Added "..mount.." to your mount list.") end else if table.contains(ori.settings.mountList, mount) then table.remove(ori.settings.mountList, table.index_of(ori.settings.mountList, mount)) ori.echo("Removed "..mount.." from your mount list!") else ori.echo(mount.." wasn't on your mount list!") end end ori.echo("Your list of mounts: "..table.concat(ori.settings.mountList, ", ")) ori.saveSettings()

Alias.name: Automount on/off
Alias.script: if matches[2] == "on" then ori.changeSetting("autoMount", true) elseif matches[2] == "off" then ori.changeSetting("autoMount", false) else ori.changeSetting("autoMount", not ori.settings.autoMount) end

Alias.name: Def sets
Alias.script: local keys = table.keys(ori.defense.sets) table.sort(keys) ori.echo("You have the following defense sets: "..table.concat(keys,", "))

Alias.name: Whois
Alias.script: local order = { "name", "fullname", "city", "house", "class", "level", "player_kills", "mob_kills", "xp_rank", "explorer_rank", } local name = matches[2]:lower():title() local data = ori.ndb.db[name] if not data then ori.echo(name .. " isn't in the name database!") return end ori.echo("Retrieved information on "..name) for _, field in ipairs(order) do cecho("\n<light_slate_blue>"..string.format("%15s",field:title():gsub("_"," ")).."<royal_blue>: <light_sky_blue>"..tostring(data[field]):title()) end ori.newLine() ori.prompt.custom()

Alias.name: Set a city's color
Alias.script: local category = matches[2]:lower() local color = matches[3] if not ori.ndb.settings[category] then ori.echo("Invalid highlighting category") end if color == "false" or color == "none" then ori.ndb.setConfig(category, "color", false) return end if not color_table[color] then ori.echo(color.." is not a valid color. Check the color table!") return end ori.ndb.setConfig(category,"color", color)

Alias.name: qwhom
Alias.script: ori.act("free", "config pagelength 250"..ori.settings.sep.."who brief"..ori.settings.sep.."config pagelength "..ori.settings.pagelength) ori.ndb.qwhomFilter = matches[2] enableTrigger("Orion qwhom") ori.ndb.qwhom = {}

Alias.name: Generosity
Alias.script: if ori.defense.priorities.selfishness then ori.quietSend("curing priority defense selfishness reset") end ori.quietSend("generosity") tempTimer(matches[2] and tonumber(matches[2]) or 15, function() if ori.defense.currentSet.keepup.selfishness and not ori.defense.priorities.selfishness then ori.quietSend("curing priority defense selfishness 25") end end)

Alias.name: Heal to full then act
Alias.script: ori.echo("Healing to full then doing: "..matches[2]) ori.actOnFull(matches[2])

Alias.name: Do #
Alias.script: ori.echo(string.format("Added %s to the do queue %s times", matches[3], matches[2])) for i = 1, tonumber(matches[2]) do ori.dor.doadd(matches[3], false) end

Script.name: Initialization
Script.script:
ori = ori or {} ori.loaded = ori.loaded or false ori.filepath = getMudletHomeDir() .. "/OrionSaves"
function ori.initialize() --Ensure this folder exists if not io.exists(ori.filepath) then lfs.mkdir(ori.filepath) end ori.loaded = false ori.leaving = false sendGMCP([[ Core.Supports.Add [ "Comm.Channel 1" ] ]]) sendGMCP([[ Core.Supports.Add ["IRE.Target 1"] ]]) sendGMCP("IRE.Rift.Request") sendGMCP("Char.Items.Inv")
if mmp.settings.gallop and ori.settings.autoGallop then mmp.settings:setOption("gallop", false) end
ori.prec.load() ori.prec.resetOutr() ori.balance.reset() ori.ssc.generateSettingsTriggers() ori.quietSend("curingset new orion") ori.quietSend("curingset switch orion") ori.quietSend("curing priority defence list reset") ori.checkAllies() ori.checkEnemies() ori.checkTattoos() ori.ndb.initialize() ori.defense.loadSets() ori.loadSettings() ori.ssc.prios = {} ori.ssc.defaultPrios = ori.ssc.getDefaultPrios() ori.ssc.resetPriorities() -- ori.defense.checkPriorities() --this is a moot point w/ the above priority reset ori.ssc.checkSettings() raiseEvent("ori reset") tempTimer(5, ori.initialize2) end
function ori.initialize2() --this'll happen 5 seconds or so later, to ensure we have all data we need. ori.loaded = true ori.prec.precache() ori.defense.swapSet(ori.class())
if not ori.ssc.settings.curing then ori.quietSend("curing on") end
raiseEvent("ori loaded") end
function ori.saveAll() end
registerAnonymousEventHandler("gmcp.Char.Name", "ori.initialize")

Script.name: Functions
Script.script:
local specMap = { ["Sword and Shield"] = "snb", ["Dual Cutting"] = "dwc", ["Dual Blunt"] = "dwb", ["Two Handed"] = "2h", }
function ori.paused() return not ori.ssc.settings.curing end
function ori.class() local class = gmcp.Char.Status.class:lower() if class:find("elemental") then class = class:gsub(" lady", "") class = class:gsub(" lord", "") end if class:find("dragon") then return "dragon" end if ori.vitals.spec then return class..(specMap[ori.vitals.spec] or "") end return class end
local oldClass = nil function ori.checkForClassChange() if oldClass~= nil and oldClass~= ori.class() then ori.defense.swapSet(ori.class()) for _, class in pairs(ori.cla) do if type(class) == "table" and class.ents then class.ents = {} end end end oldClass = ori.class() end
function ori.newLine() moveCursorEnd() if getCurrentLine() ~= "" then echo("\n") moveCursorEnd() end end
function ori.echo(text) ori.newLine() cecho("<dark_orchid>[<light_slate_blue>Orion<dark_orchid>]<lavender>: <plum>" .. text) end
function ori.echof(text, thing) ori.echo(string.format(text, thing)) end
function ori.decho(text) if ori.debug then ori.echo(text) end end
--cecho("<dark_slate_blue>O<slate_blue>r<blue_violet>i<dark_orchid>o<medium_orchid>n")
function ori.send(command) send(command, false) cecho("<dark_orchid>(<plum>" .. command .. "<dark_orchid>)") end
--this exists so I can make these all echo if I'm having trouble tracking down stuff. function ori.quietSend(command) send(command,false) end
function ori.cleanup(start, stop) for i = stop, start, -1 do moveCursor(0, i) deleteLine() end echo("") end

Script.name: Settings
Core
Script.script:
function ori.core() if ori.paused() then return end ori.lightPipes() ori.checkForClassChange() raiseEvent("ori priority request") ori.ssc.updatePriorities() ori.defense.updatePriorities() ori.ssc.checkPredictions()
if ori.affs.blackout then ori.ssc.resetChecks() end ori.ssc.balancelessChecks() ori.ssc.tree() ori.healAndAct() ori.tryToMount() ori.rejectLusts() ori.dor.run() end

Script.script:
ori = ori or {} ori.ssc = ori.ssc or {} ori.ssc.settings = ori.ssc.settings or {} -- local filepath = ori.filepath.."/sscSettings"

Script.name: ssc settings data
Generate settings triggers
Script.script:
ori.ssc.settingsTriggers = ori.ssc.settingsTriggers or {}
function ori.ssc.generateSettingsTriggers() for _, trigger in pairs(ori.ssc.settingsTriggers) do killTrigger(trigger) end ori.ssc.settingsTriggers = {} for setting, data in pairs(ori.ssc.data) do if data.type == "boolean" or data.type == "string" then for value, pattern in pairs(data.triggers) do table.insert( ori.ssc.settingsTriggers, tempExactMatchTrigger( pattern, function() ori.ssc.settings[setting] = value deleteLine() ori.echo(setting:title() .. " set to: " .. tostring(value)) end ) ) end elseif data.type == "int" then table.insert( ori.ssc.settingsTriggers, tempRegexTrigger( data.trigger, function() ori.ssc.settings[setting] = tonumber(matches[2]) deleteLine() ori.echo(setting:title() .. " set to: " .. ori.ssc.settings[setting]) end ) ) end end end

Script.name: set priorities
Script.script:
function ori.ssc.checkPriorities() enableTrigger("ori curing priorities gag") ori.quietSend("curing priority list") end
function ori.ssc.resetPriorities() local priorityString = "curing priority" for aff, priority in pairs(ori.ssc.defaultPrios) do if priority ~= ori.ssc.prios[aff:lower()] then priorityString = priorityString .." "..aff.." "..priority end end if priorityString~="curing priority" then ori.echo("Resetting priorities") ori.ssc.gaggingPriorities = true tempTimer(3, function() ori.ssc.gaggingPriorities = false end) ori.quietSend(priorityString) end end
local toChange = {}
function ori.ssc.changePriority(affliction, val) affliction = affliction:lower() if not ori.ssc.defaultPrios[affliction] then ori.echo(affliction:title().." doesn't seem to be a valid one to adjust") return end local priority = math.min(26, math.max(0,tonumber(val))) if not priority then ori.echo("No priority supplied for "..affliction:title()) end if ori.ssc.prios[affliction]~= priority then toChange[affliction] = priority end end
function ori.ssc.resetPriority(affliction) affliction = affliction:lower() ori.ssc.changePriority(affliction, ori.ssc.defaultPrios[affliction]) end
function ori.ssc.updatePriorities() local priorityString = "curing priority" for aff, priority in pairs(toChange) do priorityString = priorityString .." "..aff.." "..priority ori.ssc.prios[aff] = priority -- let's set this here to avoid potential spam, also sets on trigger. end if priorityString~="curing priority" then ori.quietSend(priorityString) end toChange = {} end

Script.name: Predictions / hidden counter
Script.script:
ori.ssc.predictions = ori.ssc.predictions or {} ori.ssc.recentAffs = {} ori.ssc.unknownAffs = 0
--unknown counter is NOT WORKING.
function ori.ssc.gotUnknown() ori.ssc.unknownAffs = ori.ssc.unknownAffs+1 if ori.oldvitals.maxmp~=ori.oldvitals.mp and ori.oldvitals.maxhp~=ori.oldvitals.hp then ori.ssc.recklessCheck() end ori.ssc.resetChecks(true) end function ori.ssc.randomMental() ori.ssc.gotUnknown() end
--if I get a symptom paired with a gmcp.Aff message, I can assume that you discovered a hidden aff. I think? function ori.ssc.symptom(aff) if ori.ssc.recentAffs[aff] then ori.ssc.recentAffs[aff] = nil ori.ssc.unknownAffs = math.max(0, ori.ssc.unknownAffs-1) end end
local usedCure = false
function ori.ssc.usedCure() usedCure = true end
function ori.ssc.checkPredictions() --I really wish I didn't have to query frequently when I have predicted affs --but other ways of handling this are far more complicated. if usedCure and table.size(ori.ssc.predictions)>0 then ori.quietSend("curing predictions") end usedCure = false end
function ori.ssc.predict(affliction) if not ori.ssc.predictions[affliction] and not ori.affs[affliction] then ori.ssc.predictions[affliction] = true ori.quietSend("curing predict "..affliction) end end
function ori.ssc.recklessCheck() if ori.vitals.hp == ori.vitals.maxhp and ori.vitals.mp == ori.vitals.maxmp and not ori.affs.recklessness then ori.ssc.predict("recklessness") end end

Script.name: Hidden checks
Script.script:
ori.ssc.possibleHidden = ori.ssc.possibleHidden or {} ori.ssc.hiddenCheckData = { asthma = {action = "hold breath", eqbal = true}, anorexia = {action = "eat vial", eqbal = false}, paralysis = {action = "touch mindseye", eqbal = true}, haemophilia = {action = "clot", eqbal = false}, impatience = {action = "meditate", eqbal = true}, disrupted = {action = "concentrate", eqbal = false}, } local throttled = false local throttleTimer function ori.ssc.resetChecks(clearTimer) ori.ssc.possibleHidden = {} for aff, _ in pairs(ori.ssc.hiddenCheckData) do if not ori.affs[aff] then ori.ssc.possibleHidden[aff] = true end end if clearTimer then throttled = false if throttleTimer then killTimer(throttleTimer) end end end
function ori.ssc.balancefulChecks() if ori.affs.aeon or ori.affs.retardation or not ori.settings.hiddenChecks then return "" end local check = "" for aff, _ in pairs(ori.ssc.possibleHidden) do if ori.ssc.hiddenCheckData[aff].eqbal then if aff~="asthma" or not table.contains(gmcp.Room.Info.details, "underwater") then check = check..ori.ssc.hiddenCheckData[aff].action..ori.settings.sep end end end return check end
function ori.ssc.balancelessChecks() if ori.affs.aeon or ori.affs.retardation or throttled or not ori.settings.hiddenChecks then return end local checks = {} for aff, _ in pairs(ori.ssc.possibleHidden) do if not ori.ssc.hiddenCheckData[aff].eqbal then table.insert(checks, ori.ssc.hiddenCheckData[aff].action) end end if #checks>0 then ori.quietSend(table.concat(checks, ori.settings.sep)) throttled = true throttleTimer = tempTimer(.5, function() throttled = false end) end end
function ori.ssc.denyHidden(affliction) if ori.ssc.possibleHidden[affliction] then deleteLine() ori.ssc.possibleHidden[affliction] = nil end end
function ori.ssc.confirmHidden(affliction) ori.ssc.possibleHidden[affliction] = nil end

Script.name: Tree
Script.script:
ori.ssc.treeScenarios = ori.ssc.treeScenarios or {}
local spamGate = false function ori.ssc.tree() if not ori.able.tree() or spamGate or not ori.tattoos.tree then return end for _, scenario in pairs(ori.ssc.treeScenarios) do if scenario() then if ori.affs.blackout then ori.send("touch tree"..ori.settings.sep.."touch tree") else ori.send("touch tree") end spamGate = true tempTimer(1, function() spamGate = false end) return end end end

Script.name: aff level checking
Script.script: function ori.affLevel(affliction) affliction = affliction:lower() if ori.affs[affliction] then return 1 end for aff, _ in pairs(ori.affs) do local level = string.match(aff, affliction.." %((%d+)%)") if level then return level end end return 0 end

Script.name: set a priorityaff
Script.script: ori.ssc.prioaff = "none" function ori.setPrioaff(aff) if aff ~= ori.ssc.prioaff then ori.quietSend("curing prioaff " .. aff) end end

Script.name: Items
Script.script:
ori.inv = ori.inv or {} ori.roomItems = ori.roomItems or {}
local function itemList(_, _) local event = gmcp.Char.Items.List local tab if event.location == "inv" then ori.inv = {} tab = ori.inv elseif event.location == "room" then ori.roomItems = {} tab = ori.roomItems else return end for _, item in pairs(event.items) do tab[item.id] = item end if event.location == "inv" then ori.prec.resetOutrInv() end raiseEvent("ori inventory updated") end
local function itemRemove() local event = gmcp.Char.Items.Remove local tab if event.location == "inv" then tab = ori.inv elseif event.location == "room" then tab = ori.roomItems else return end tab[event.item.id] = nil raiseEvent("ori inventory updated") end
local function itemAdd() local event = gmcp.Char.Items.Add local tab if event.location == "inv" then tab = ori.inv elseif event.location == "room" then tab = ori.roomItems else return end tab[event.item.id] = event.item raiseEvent("ori inventory updated") end
local function itemUpdate() local event = gmcp.Char.Items.Update local tab if event.location == "inv" then tab = ori.inv --let's see if we removed something and we didn't try to remove something within the last 3 commands local item = ori.inv[event.item.id] if item and item.attrib and item.attrib:find("w") and event.item.attrib and event.item.attrib:find("W") then if not ori.checkCommands("remove", 4) then --if so, then rewear it! ori.send("wear "..event.item.id) end end elseif event.location == "room" then tab = ori.roomItems else return end tab[event.item.id] = event.item raiseEvent("ori inventory updated") end
registerNamedEventHandler("inv", "List", "gmcp.Char.Items.List", itemList) registerNamedEventHandler("inv", "Add", "gmcp.Char.Items.Add", itemAdd) registerNamedEventHandler("inv", "Remove", "gmcp.Char.Items.Remove", itemRemove) registerNamedEventHandler("inv", "Update", "gmcp.Char.Items.Update", itemUpdate)

Script.name: Rift
Script.script:
ori.rift = ori.rift or {} local mt = {} mt.__index = function(table, key) return 0 end setmetatable(ori.rift, mt)
local function riftChange() local item = gmcp.IRE.Rift.Change ori.rift[item.name] = tonumber(item.amount) raiseEvent("ori rift updated") end
local function riftList() ori.rift = {} setmetatable(ori.rift, mt) for _, item in pairs(gmcp.IRE.Rift.List) do ori.rift[item.name] = tonumber(item.amount) end raiseEvent("ori rift updated") end
registerNamedEventHandler("rift","change","gmcp.IRE.Rift.Change", riftChange) registerNamedEventHandler("rift","list","gmcp.IRE.Rift.List", riftList)

Script.name: Defs
Script.script:
ori.defs = ori.defs or {} ori.defense = ori.defense or {} ori.defense.recentlyGained = {} ori.defense.recentlyLost = {} local function defsList() ori.defs = {} for _, def in pairs(gmcp.Char.Defences.List) do ori.defs[def.name] = true end raiseEvent("ori defs updated") end
local function defsAdd() local defense = gmcp.Char.Defences.Add.name ori.defs[defense] = true ori.defense.recentlyGained[defense] = true if defense ~= "heldbreath" then ori.echo("<pale_green>Defense gained: "..defense) end raiseEvent("ori defs updated") table.insert(ori.defense.recent, defense) end
local function defsRemove() for _, def in pairs(gmcp.Char.Defences.Remove) do if def ~= "heldbreath" then ori.echo("<indian_red>Defense lost: "..def) end ori.defs[def] = nil ori.defense.recentlyLost[def] = true end raiseEvent("ori defs updated") end
registerNamedEventHandler("defs","list","gmcp.Char.Defences.List", defsList) registerNamedEventHandler("defs","add","gmcp.Char.Defences.Add", defsAdd) registerNamedEventHandler("defs","remove","gmcp.Char.Defences.Remove", defsRemove)

Script.name: Affs
Script.script:
ori.affs = ori.affs or {}
local function affsList() ori.affs = {} ori.ssc.unknownAffs = 0 for _, aff in pairs(gmcp.Char.Afflictions.List) do ori.affs[aff.name] = true end raiseEvent("ori affs updated") end
local function affsAdd() local aff = gmcp.Char.Afflictions.Add.name ori.echo("<indian_red>Gained Aff: "..aff) ori.affs[aff] = true ori.ssc.possibleHidden[aff] = nil ori.ssc.recentAffs[aff] = true
if aff == "amnesia" and not ori.paused() then ori.send("touch flaws") elseif aff == "aeon" then ori.send("curing batch off") end raiseEvent("ori affs updated") end
local riftAffs = { brokenleftarm = true, damagedleftarm = true, mangledleftarm = true, brokenrightarm = true, damagedrightarm = true, mangledrightarm = true, webbed = true, bound = true, entangled = true, transfixation = true, aeon = true, }
local function affsRemove() local pcCheck = false for _, aff in pairs(gmcp.Char.Afflictions.Remove) do ori.echo("<pale_green>Cured Aff: "..aff) if riftAffs[aff] then pcCheck = true end if aff == "aeon" then ori.send("curing batch on") end if aff == "blackout" then sendGMCP("Char.Items.Inv") send("") end ori.ssc.predictions[aff] = nil if not ori.affs[aff] then ori.ssc.unknownAffs = math.max(0, ori.ssc.unknownAffs - 1) end ori.ssc.recentAffs[aff] = true ori.affs[aff] = nil end if pcCheck then ori.prec.precache() end raiseEvent("ori affs updated") end
registerNamedEventHandler("affs", "list", "gmcp.Char.Afflictions.List", affsList) registerNamedEventHandler("affs", "add", "gmcp.Char.Afflictions.Add", affsAdd) registerNamedEventHandler("affs", "remove", "gmcp.Char.Afflictions.Remove", affsRemove)

Script.name: Players
Script.script:
ori.players = ori.players or {}
local function playerList() ori.players = {} for _, player in pairs(gmcp.Room.Players) do table.insert(ori.players, player.name) if not ori.ndb.db[player.name] then ori.ndb.query(player.name) end end raiseEvent("ori players updated") end
local function playerAdd() table.insert(ori.players, gmcp.Room.AddPlayer.name) if not ori.ndb.db[gmcp.Room.AddPlayer.name] then ori.ndb.query(gmcp.Room.AddPlayer.name) end raiseEvent("ori players updated") end
local function playerRemove() table.remove(ori.players, table.index_of(ori.players, gmcp.Room.RemovePlayer)) raiseEvent("ori players updated") end
registerNamedEventHandler("players", "list", "gmcp.Room.Players", playerList) registerNamedEventHandler("players", "add", "gmcp.Room.AddPlayer", playerAdd) registerNamedEventHandler("players", "remove", "gmcp.Room.RemovePlayer", playerRemove)

Script.name: Balance
Script.script:
ori.bals = ori.bals or { eq = true, bal = true, sip = true, smoke = true, eat = true, salve = true, tree = true, focus = true, immunity = true, moss = true, tree = true } ori.balance = ori.balance or {} ori.balance.stopwatches = ori.balance.stopwatches or {} local gmcpBals = {bal = true, eq = true}
function ori.balance.lost(bal, ignoreBal) --ignoreBal exists just so I can get this to work with gmcp, scree. if not ignoreBal and not ori.bals[bal] then return end if not ori.balance.stopwatches[bal] then ori.balance.stopwatches[bal] = createStopWatch() end if not gmcpBals[bal] or ori.affs.blackout then ori.bals[bal] = false end startStopWatch(ori.balance.stopwatches[bal], true) end
function ori.balance.regained(bal) if not gmcpBals[bal] or ori.affs.blackout then ori.bals[bal] = true end cecho("<antique_white>[<pale_green>"..bal:title().."<antique_white>]") if ori.balance.stopwatches[bal] then local time = stopStopWatch(ori.balance.stopwatches[bal]) if time then cecho(" <dark_turquoise>(<plum>"..(math.floor(time*100)/100).."<dark_turquoise>)") end end if not ori.bals[bal] then startStopWatch(ori.balance.stopwatches[bal], true) end end
function ori.balance.reset() for bal in pairs(ori.bals) do ori.bals[bal] = true end end
registerAnonymousEventHandler("ori reset", "ori.balance.reset")
function ori.balance.gmcp() for bal in pairs(gmcpBals) do if gmcp.Char.Vitals[bal] and (gmcp.Char.Vitals[bal]=="1"~=ori.bals[bal]) then ori.bals[bal] = gmcp.Char.Vitals[bal]=="1" if not ori.bals[bal] then ori.balance.lost(bal, true) end end end end

Script.name: Vitals
Room Info
Script.script:
ori.room = ori.room or { elevation = "ground", indoors = false, walls = {}, doors = {} } local function handleRoomInfo()
enableTrigger("Orion walls") enableTrigger("Orion doors")
ori.room.walls = {} ori.room.doors = {}
if gmcp.Room.Info.name:sub(1,12) == "Flying above" then ori.room.elevation = "flying" elseif gmcp.Room.Info.name:sub(1, 18) == "In the trees above" then ori.room.elevation = "trees" else ori.room.elevation = "ground" end
ori.room.indoors = table.contains(gmcp.Room.Info.details, "indoors")
end
registerNamedEventHandler("room","info", "gmcp.Room.Info", handleRoomInfo)

Script.name: Command history
Script.script:
ori.history = ori.history or {}
function ori.checkCommands(phrase, distance) phrase = phrase:lower() for index, command in pairs(ori.history) do if command:lower():find(phrase) then return true end if index >= distance then return false end end return false end
--stores the last 20 commands sent by mudlet to the game.
local function recordCommands(_, command) table.insert(ori.history, 1, command) ori.history[21] = nil end
registerNamedEventHandler("ori", "commands", "sysDataSendRequest", recordCommands)

Script.name: Time
Script.script:
ori.time = ori.time or {}
local function listHandler() for index, value in pairs(gmcp.IRE.Time.List) do ori.time[index] = value end end
local function updateHandler() for index, value in pairs(gmcp.IRE.Time.Update) do ori.time[index] = value end end
local function addSupport() sendGMCP([[Core.Supports.Add ["IRE.Time 1"] ]]) end
registerNamedEventHandler("time","list","gmcp.IRE.Time.List", listHandler) registerNamedEventHandler("time","update","gmcp.IRE.Time.Update", updateHandler) registerNamedEventHandler("time","support","gmcp.Char.Name", addSupport)

Script.name: Defense sets
Script.script:
ori.defense = ori.defense or {} ori.defense.currentSet = ori.defense.currentSet or {keepup = {}, defup = {}} ori.defense.sets = ori.defense.sets or {} ori.defense.priorities = ori.defense.priorities or {} ori.defense.recent = ori.defense.recent or {} local path = ori.filepath .. "/defenseSets"
function ori.defense.loadSets() if io.exists(path) then table.load(path, ori.defense.sets) end end
function ori.defense.saveSets() table.save(path, ori.defense.sets) end
function ori.defense.createSet(set) set = set:lower() if ori.defense.sets[set] then ori.echo("The " .. set .. " defense set already exists!") return end ori.defense.sets[set] = {keepup = {}, defup = {}} end
function ori.defense.checkPriorities() enableTrigger("ori defense priority gag") ori.quietSend("curing priority defence list") end
function ori.defense.changePriority(defense, priority) defense = defense:lower() if priority then priority = math.min(math.max(priority, 1),25) end ori.defense.customPriorities[defense] = priority end
function ori.defense.clearPrios(set) local defenseString = "curing priority defence" for def, prio in pairs(ori.defense.priorities) do if not set or (not set.keepup[def] and (not set.defup[def] or ori.defs[def])) or not (table.contains(ori.defense.groups.general, def) or table.contains(ori.defense.groups[ori.class()], def)) then defenseString = defenseString .. " " .. def .. " reset" end end if defenseString ~= "curing priority defence" then ori.quietSend(defenseString) end end
function ori.defense.swapSet(set) set = set:lower() if not ori.defense.sets[set] then ori.defense.createSet(set) ori.echo("The " .. set .. " defense set did not exist. Created it.") end ori.defense.currentSet = ori.defense.sets[set] ori.echo("Swapped to the " .. set .. " defense set.") ori.defense.defup() end
function ori.defense.toggle(type, def, setting, noecho) def = def:lower() if ori.defense.currentSet[type][def] or (setting ~= nil and not setting) then ori.defense.currentSet[type][def] = nil if not noecho then ori.echo(def:title() .. " removed from " .. type) end ori.defense.saveSets() elseif table.contains(ori.defense.groups.general, def) or table.contains(ori.defense.groups[ori.class()], def) then ori.defense.currentSet[type][def] = true if not noecho then ori.echo(def:title() .. " added to " .. type) end ori.defense.saveSets() else ori.echo(def:title() .. " is not a valid defense for " .. ori.class():title()) end end
--this is meant for manual stuffs function ori.defense.keep(def, bool, echo) def = def:lower() if not table.contains(ori.defense.groups.general, def) or table.contains(ori.defense.groups[ori.class()], def) then ori.echo(def:title().." is not a valid defense for "..ori.class():title()) end if bool == nil then bool = not ori.defense.currentSet.keepup[def] end if bool then ori.defense.currentSet.keepup[def] = true if not ori.defense.priorities[def] then ori.quietSend("curing priority defence "..def.." "..(ori.defense.customPriorities[def] or 25)) end if echo then ori.echo("Now keeping: "..def:title()) end else ori.defense.currentSet.keepup[def] = nil if ori.defense.priorities[def] then ori.quietSend("curing priority defence "..def.." reset") end if echo then ori.echo("No longer keeping: "..def:title()) end end end
function ori.defense.defup() ori.defense.clearPrios(ori.defense.currentSet) ori.defense.wearArmor() local defenseString = "curing priority defence" for _, type in pairs({"keepup", "defup"}) do for def in pairs(ori.defense.currentSet[type]) do if not ori.defense.priorities[def] and (type == "keepup" or not ori.defs[def]) --make sure it's a defense your class can actually use this and (table.contains(ori.defense.groups.general, def) or table.contains(ori.defense.groups[ori.class()], def)) then defenseString = defenseString .. " " .. def .. " " .. (ori.defense.customPriorities[def] or 25) end end end if defenseString ~= "curing priority defence " then ori.quietSend(defenseString) end ori.defense.eatDefs(true) end
function ori.defense.updatePriorities() local defenseString = "curing priority defence" for _, def in pairs(ori.defense.recent) do if ori.defense.priorities[def] and not ori.defense.currentSet.keepup[def] then defenseString = defenseString .. " " .. def .. " reset" ori.defense.priorities[def] = nil end end ori.defense.recent = {} for def, prio in pairs(ori.defense.customPriorities) do if ori.defense.priorities[def] and ori.defense.priorities[def] ~= prio then defenseString = defenseString .. " " .. def .. " " .. prio ori.defense.priorities[def] = prio end end if defenseString ~= "curing priority defence" then ori.quietSend(defenseString) end end

Script.name: Defense groups
Armor
Script.script: local armor = { bard = "leather", monk = "leather", alchemist = "ringmail", apostate = "ringmail", serpent = "scalemail", jester = "scalemail", shaman = "scalemail", occultist = "scalemail", depthswalker = "scalemail", blademaster = "scalemail", druid = "chainmail", sentinel = "chainmail", sylvan = "chainmail", classless = "chainmail", priest = "splintmail", paladin = "fullplate", paladin2h = "fullplate", paladindwc = "fullplate", paladindwb = "fullplate", paladinsnb = "fullplate", infernal = "fullplate", infernal2h = "fullplate", infernaldwc = "fullplate", infernaldwb = "fullplate", infernalsnb = "fullplate", runewarden = "fullplate", runewarden2h = "fullplate", runewardendwc = "fullplate", runewardendwb = "fullplate", runewardensnb = "fullplate", unnamable = "fullplate", unnameable2h = "fullplate", unnameabledwc = "fullplate", unnameablesnb = "fullplate", unnameabledwb = "fullplate", } function ori.defense.wearArmor() ori.send("remove armour"..ori.settings.sep.."wear "..(armor[ori.class()] or "clotharmour")) end

Script.name: Defense menu
Script.script:
--repurposed menu code from other stuff function ori.defense.menu(mode) ori.echo("Editing defences mode: " .. mode:title()) moveCursorEnd() local start, stop = getLineNumber() for _, group in pairs({"general", ori.class()}) do cecho( "
<RoyalBlue>(<MediumSlateBlue>====<RoyalBlue><<MediumSeaGreen>" .. group:title() .. "<RoyalBlue>><MediumSlateBlue>" .. string.rep("=", 89 - #group) .. "<RoyalBlue>)" ) local counter = 0 for _, defense in pairs(ori.defense.groups[group]) do if counter == 0 then cecho("
" .. "<RoyalBlue>(~~]<MediumSlateBlue>: ") end counter = (counter + 1) % 6 --display cecho cecholink - toggles, and redisplays defences.edit local command = function() ori.defense.toggle(mode, defense, not ori.defense.currentSet[mode][defense], true) ori.cleanup(start, stop) ori.defense.menu(mode) end cechoLink( (ori.defense.currentSet[mode][defense] and "<PeachPuff>" or "<IndianRed>") .. defense:title(), command, "Toggle " .. defense:title(), true ) echo(string.rep(" ", 15 - #defense)) end end cecho("
<RoyalBlue>(<MediumSlateBlue>" .. string.rep("=", 95) .. "<RoyalBlue>)") echo("
") moveCursorEnd() stop = getLineNumber() ori.prompt.custom() end

Script.name: Display current defences
Om nom nom
Script.script:
local eats = {thirdeye = "dolomite", deathsight = "azurite"}
function ori.defense.eatDefs(defup) for def, mineral in pairs(eats) do if not ori.defs[def] and ori.settings[def .. "Eat"] and (ori.defense.currentSet.keepup[def] or (defup and ori.defense.currentSet.defup[def])) then if not ori.ssc.settings.transmutation then mineral = ori.utils.transToConc[mineral] end ori.send("outr "..mineral..ori.settings.sep.."eat "..mineral) end end end

Script.name: custom defense priorities
Script.script: ori.defense.customPriorities = { }

Script.name: Precache
Script.script:
ori.outr = ori.outr or {} local mt = { __index = function(table, key) return 0 end, } setmetatable(ori.outr, mt) ori.prec = ori.prec or {}
function ori.prec.precache() if ori.paused() then return end --check for rift lock if not ori.able.rift() or ori.affs.retardation or ori.affs.aeon or ori.leaving then return end
local outrStrings = {} for herb, level in pairs(ori.prec.levels) do --I am not doing fallback here, that feels like suffering. Weep local quantity = math.min(ori.rift[herb], math.max(0, level - ori.outr[herb])) if quantity > 0 then table.insert(outrStrings, "outr " .. quantity .. " " .. herb) end if #outrStrings>=15 then ori.quietSend(table.concat(outrStrings, ori.settings.sep)) outrStrings = {} end end local finalString = table.concat(outrStrings, ori.settings.sep) if finalString ~= "" then ori.quietSend(finalString) end end
function ori.prec.resetOutrInv() --reset outr table based on the contents of your inventory. prolly a bit overkill but YEET for herb, count in pairs(ori.outr) do ori.outr[herb] = nil end for id, item in pairs(ori.inv) do if item.attrib == "gre" and item.icon == "curative" then --this should be a rifted cure? I think. for _, curative in pairs(ori.utils.eatableList) do if item.name:find("%f[%a]"..curative.."%f[%A]") then local count = item.name:match("a group of (%d+)") or 1 ori.outr[curative] = ori.outr[curative] + count break end end end end if ori.loaded then ori.prec.precache() end end
function ori.prec.resetOutr() --just clears out the table. for herb, count in pairs(ori.outr) do ori.outr[herb] = nil end end

Script.name: Precache menus
Script.script:
ori.prec = ori.prec or {} ori.prec.levels = ori.prec.levels or {} local path = ori.filepath .. "/precache"
function ori.prec.load() if io.exists(path) then table.load(path, ori.prec.levels) end end
function ori.prec.save() table.save(path, ori.prec.levels) ori.echo("Saved precache levels") end
local saveTimer local function adjust(herb, count) ori.prec.levels[herb] = count > 0 and count or nil ori.prec.menu() if saveTimer then killTimer(saveTimer) end saveTimer = tempTimer(10, function() ori.prec.save() ori.prec.precache() end) end
local function arrows(herb) local count = ori.prec.levels[herb] or 0 if count>0 then cechoLink("<deep_sky_blue><", function() adjust(herb, count-1) end, "Decrease "..herb.." by 1", true) else cecho("<dim_gray><") end cecho((count>0 and "<tomato>" or "<dim_gray>")..count) cechoLink("<deep_sky_blue>>", function() adjust(herb, count+1) end, "Increase "..herb.." by 1", true)
return #(""..count)+2 end
local start, stop function ori.prec.menu() if start and stop then ori.cleanup(start, stop) end ori.echo("Precache levels:") moveCursorEnd() start = getLineNumber() cecho("\n<medium_orchid>+"..string.rep("-",20).."+"..string.rep("-",20).."+")
for conc, trans in spairs(ori.utils.concToTrans) do echo("\n") cecho("<medium_orchid>| <light_slate_blue>"..string.format("%12s", conc:title()).."<medium_orchid>: ") echo(string.rep(" ", 5-arrows(conc))) cecho("<medium_orchid>| <light_slate_blue>"..string.format("%12s", trans:title()).."<medium_orchid>: ") cecho(string.rep(" ", 5-arrows(trans)).."<medium_orchid>|") end cecho("\n<medium_orchid>+"..string.rep("-",20).."+"..string.rep("-",20).."+\n") moveCursorEnd() ori.prompt.custom() stop = getLineNumber() end

Script.name: Queue tracking
Script.script:
ori.queues = ori.queues or { eb = {}, balance = {}, freestand = {}, stun = {}, free = {}, paralysis = {}, class = {}, ship = {}, unbound = {}, full = {}, }
ori.queue = ori.queue or {}
local function ensure(queue) ori.queues[queue] = ori.queues[queue] or {} end
function ori.queue.add(queue, command) ensure(queue) table.insert(ori.queues[queue], command) end
function ori.queue.insert(queue, position, command) ensure(queue) if position> #ori.queues[queue] then ori.queue.add(queue, command) else table.insert(ori.queues[queue], position, command) end end
local lastCommand = "" local lastQueue = "" function ori.queue.run(queue, command) ensure(queue) lastQueue = queue lastCommand = command table.remove(ori.queues[queue], 1) end
function ori.queue.balFailure() ori.queue.add(lastQueue, lastCommand) end
function ori.queue.replace(queue, position, command) ensure(queue) ori.queues[queue][position] = command end
function ori.queue.remove(queue, position) ensure(queue) table.remove(ori.queues[queue], position) end
function ori.queue.clear(queue) ori.queues[queue] = {} end
function ori.queue.clearAll() for queue in pairs(ori.queues) do ori.queues[queue] = {} end end
registerAnonymousEventHandler("ori reset", "ori.queue.clearAll")

Script.name: Able
Script.script:
ori.able = {}
function ori.able.freestand() return ori.able.eqbal() and ori.able.free() and not ori.affs.prone end
function ori.able.class() return false end
function ori.able.eq() return ori.bals.eq end
function ori.able.bal() return ori.bals.bal end
function ori.able.eqbal() return ori.bals.eq and ori.bals.bal end
function ori.able.free() return ori.able.eqbal() and ori.able.bound() and not ori.affs.paralysis end
function ori.able.bound() return not ori.affs.bound and not ori.affs.webbed and not ori.affs.entangled and not ori.affs.transfixation end
function ori.able.stunned() --?? how do I check this end
function ori.able.rift() return ori.able.bound() and not ( (ori.affs.brokenleftarm or ori.affs.damagedleftarm or ori.affs.mangledleftarm) and (ori.affs.brokenrightarm or ori.affs.damagedrightarm or ori.affs.mangledrightarm) ) end
function ori.able.tree() return (ori.bals.tree or getStopWatchTime(ori.balance.stopwatches.tree) > 14.5) and ori.able.rift() and not ori.affs.paralysis end

Script.name: Act/queue
Script.script:
function ori.act(queue, ...) if type(arg[1]) == "table" then arg = arg[1] end action = table.concat(arg, ori.settings.sep) if ori.able[queue]() then ori.send(action) else if #ori.queues[queue]>0 then ori.send("queue addclear "..queue.." "..action) else ori.send("queue add "..queue.." "..action) end end end local times = {}
function ori.actLimited(name, time, queue, balanceful, gagged, ...) if times[name] and os.clock()-time < times[name] then return end times[name] = os.clock() if type(arg[1]) == "table" then arg = arg[1] end action = table.concat(arg, ori.settings.sep) local command if ori.able[queue]() then command = action else if #ori.queues[queue]>0 then if balanceful then command = "queue addclear "..queue.." "..action else command = "queue prepend "..queue.." "..action end else command = "queue add "..queue.." "..action end end if gagged then ori.quietSend(command) else ori.send(command) end end

Script.name: NDB
Script.script:
ori.ndb = ori.ndb or {} --metamethod to case-correct keys and return a blank entry if you reference someone who doesn't exist --nvm on some of the other functionality, caused trouble. Would need bigger redesign of whole ndb
function ori.ndb.initialize() ori.ndb.db = {} if io.exists(ori.filepath .. "/ndb") then table.load(ori.filepath .. "/ndb", ori.ndb.db) end ori.ndb.cityEnemies = {} if io.exists(ori.filepath.."/cityEnemies") then table.load(ori.filepath .. "/cityEnemies", ori.ndb.cityEnemies) end ori.ndb.loadConfigs() ori.ndb.generateAllHighlights() ori.ndb.loaded = true ori.ndb.getOnlineCharacters() ori.echo("NDB loaded") end
function ori.ndb.save() if ori.ndb.db then table.save(ori.filepath .. "/ndb", ori.ndb.db) end ori.echo("NDB saved") end

Script.name: Api handler
Script.script:
function ori.ndb.query(character) if not ori.ndb.loaded then return false end getHTTP("api.achaea.com/characters/"..character..".json") end
function ori.ndb.getOnlineCharacters() getHTTP("api.achaea.com/characters.json") end
local fix_table = { ["(hidden)"] = "hidden", ["(none)"] = "none", }
function ori.ndb.handleResponse(_, url, body) if url:match("https://api%.achaea%.com/characters/(%w+)%.json") then if body:match("Character .+ was not found") then return end --the person didn't exist local data = yajl.to_value(body) ori.ndb.db[data.name] = ori.ndb.db[data.name] or {} for key, value in pairs(data) do if not ori.ndb.db[data.name][key] or value~="(hidden)" then ori.ndb.db[data.name][key] = fix_table[value] or value end end ori.ndb.generateHighlight(data.name) elseif url == "https://api.achaea.com/characters.json" then
local count = 0 --query anyone we don't have here. local data = yajl.to_value(body) if ori.ndb.qws then ori.ndb.qws = false ori.ndb.qwsorted(data) end
for _, person in pairs(data.characters) do if not ori.ndb.db[person.name] then ori.ndb.query(person.name) count = count+1 end end if count>0 then ori.echo("Checked character list. Retrieving information on "..count.." people.") end end end
registerAnonymousEventHandler("sysGetHttpDone", "ori.ndb.handleResponse")

Script.name: Qws
Honoring people
Script.script:
ori.ndb.data = ori.ndb.data or {}
ori.ndb.honoring = nil
function ori.ndb.honors(person, gagged) person = person:lower():title() ori.ndb.honoring = person if gagged then enableTrigger("NDB honors gag") end ori.act("free", "honors "..person) end
ori.ndb.hidden = {} function ori.ndb.honorsHidden() ori.ndb.hidden = {} for person, data in pairs(ori.ndb.db) do if data.city == "hidden" then table.insert(ori.ndb.hidden, person) end end if #ori.ndb.hidden>0 then ori.echo("We have "..#ori.ndb.hidden.." people to check!") ori.ndb.honors(ori.ndb.hidden[1], true) else ori.echo("No hidden people to check.") end end

Script.name: Generate highlights
Script.script:
ori.ndb.highlightTriggers = ori.ndb.highlightTriggers or {}
function ori.ndb.generateAllHighlights() for person, data in pairs(ori.ndb.db) do ori.ndb.generateHighlight(person) end end
--some stuff yoinked from demonnic's generic highlighter which was repurposed from mmf. Witchcraft, I say! local function highlight(person) local color = ori.ndb.getColor(person) local r, g, b if color then r, g, b = unpack(color_table[color]) end local bold = ori.ndb.getBold(person) local italic = ori.ndb.getItalic(person) local underline = ori.ndb.getUnderline(person)
local c, k = 1, 1 while k > 0 do k = utf8.find(line, person, k, true) if k == nil then return end c = c + 1 if (k == utf8.find(line, "%f[%a]" .. person .. "%f[%A]", k)) then if selectString(person, c - 1) > -1 then if color then setFgColor(r, g, b) end setBold(bold) setItalics(italic) setUnderline(underline) else return end end k = k + 1 end end
function ori.ndb.generateHighlight(person) person = person:lower():title() if ori.ndb.highlightTriggers[person] then killTrigger(ori.ndb.highlightTriggers[person]) end ori.ndb.highlightTriggers[person] = tempTrigger( person, function() highlight(person) end ) end

Script.name: ndb api
Script.script:
local function getSetting(person, setting) local person = person:lower():title() if ori.ndb.db[person] then if ori.allies[person] and ori.ndb.settings.allies[setting] then return ori.ndb.settings.allies[setting] elseif ori.enemies[person] and ori.ndb.settings.enemies[setting] then return ori.ndb.settings.enemies[setting] elseif ori.ndb.cityEnemies[person] and ori.ndb.settings.cityenemy[setting] then return ori.ndb.settings.cityenemy[setting] else local city = ori.ndb.db[person].city == "" and "divine" or ori.ndb.db[person].city return ori.ndb.settings[city][setting] end else return false end end
function ori.ndb.getCity(person) local person = person:lower():title() if ori.ndb.db[person] then return ori.ndb.db[person].city end return "unknown" end
function ori.ndb.getClass(person) local person = person:lower():title() if ori.ndb.db[person] then return ori.ndb.db[person].class end return "unknown" end
function ori.ndb.getColor(person) return getSetting(person, "color") end
function ori.ndb.getBold(person) return getSetting(person, "bold") end
function ori.ndb.getItalic(person) return getSetting(person, "italic") end
function ori.ndb.getUnderline(person) return getSetting(person, "underline") end

Script.name: NDB configs
Script.script:
local path = ori.filepath .. "/ndbc" ori.ndb.settings = ori.ndb.settings or { none = {color = "ivory", italic = false, bold = false, underline = false}, hidden = {color = "light_salmon", italic = true, bold = false, underline = false}, eleusis = {color = "lawn_green", italic = false, bold = false, underline = false}, hashan = {color = "light_slate_blue", italic = false, bold = false, underline = false}, ashtan = {color = "tomato", italic = false, bold = false, underline = false}, targossas = {color = "yellow", italic = false, bold = false, underline = false}, cyrene = {color = "light_sky_blue", italic = false, bold = false, underline = false}, mhaldor = {color = "firebrick", italic = false, bold = false, underline = false}, underworld = {color = "sienna", italic = false, bold = false, underline = false}, divine = {color = "magenta", italic = false, bold = true, underline = false}, allies = {color = false, italic = false, bold = false, underline = false}, enemies = {color = false, italic = false, bold = false, underline = false}, cityenemy = {color = false, italic = false, bold = false, underline = false}, }
function ori.ndb.loadConfigs() if io.exists(path) then local tempSettings = {} table.load(path, tempSettings) for key, value in pairs(tempSettings) do ori.ndb.settings[key]=value end end end
function ori.ndb.saveConfigs() table.save(path, ori.ndb.settings) end
function ori.ndb.setConfig(category, setting, value) local category = category:lower() if not ori.ndb.settings[category] then ori.echo("Invalid category for ndb settings: "..category) return end ori.ndb.settings[category][setting] = value -- ori.echo("Adjusted "..setting.." for "..category:title()) ori.ndb.saveConfigs() ori.ndb.configMenu() end
local function formatToggle(word, value) return " <light_sky_blue>(<"..(value and "lawn_green" or "tomato")..">"..word.."<light_sky_blue>)" end local function formatButton(word) return " <light_sky_blue>(<dodger_blue>"..word.."<light_sky_blue>)" end
local start, stop function ori.ndb.configMenu() --ensure only one instance of the menu exists if start and stop then ori.cleanup(start, stop) end ori.echo("NDB Config menu") moveCursorEnd() start = getLineNumber() cecho("<medium_orchid>\n+"..string.rep("-",10).."+"..string.rep("-",43).."+") for _, category in ipairs({"ashtan","cyrene","eleusis","hashan","mhaldor","targossas", "underworld", "divine", "hidden", "none", "allies", "enemies", "cityenemy"}) do cecho("\n<medium_orchid>|") resetFormat() echo(string.rep(" ",10-#category)) if ori.ndb.settings[category].color then local r,g,b = unpack(color_table[ori.ndb.settings[category].color]) setFgColor(r,g,b) end setItalics(ori.ndb.settings[category].italic) setUnderline(ori.ndb.settings[category].underline) setBold(ori.ndb.settings[category].bold) echo(category:title()) cecho("<medium_orchid>|") cechoLink(formatButton("color"), function() clearCmdLine() appendCmdLine("ndbc color "..category.." ") end, "Set color for "..category:title(),true) cechoLink(formatButton("clr"), function() ori.ndb.setConfig(category, "color", false) end, "Clear color for "..category:title(), true) for _, setting in ipairs({"bold","italic","underline"}) do local value = ori.ndb.settings[category][setting] cechoLink(formatToggle(setting, value), function() ori.ndb.setConfig(category, setting, not value) end, "Toggle "..setting.." for "..category:title(), true) end cecho(" <medium_orchid>|") end cecho("<medium_orchid>\n+"..string.rep("-",10).."+"..string.rep("-",43).."+") echo("\n") moveCursorEnd() ori.prompt.custom() stop = getLineNumber() end

Script.name: Allies, enemies, and lusts
Script.script:
ori.lusts = ori.lusts or {} ori.allies = ori.allies or {} ori.enemies = ori.enemies or {}
function ori.rejectLusts() if not ori.settings.autoReject then return end if #ori.lusts>0 and not ori.affs.aeon and not ori.affs.retardation then while #ori.lusts>0 and (table.contains(ori.settings.lustList, ori.lusts[1]:lower()) or table.contains(ori.settings.lustList, ori.ndb.getCity(ori.lusts[1]))) do --pop off any whitelisted people table.remove(ori.lusts,1) end if #ori.lusts>0 then ori.actLimited("reject lust", 1, "free", true, false, "reject "..ori.lusts[1]) end end end
function ori.checkAllies() enableTrigger("Gag ally list") ori.quietSend("allies") end
function ori.checkEnemies() enableTrigger("Gag enemy list") ori.quietSend("enemies") end

Script.name: Tattoos
Get commands to prepend
Script.script:
function ori.prepend() local prepend = "" if ori.affs.aeon or ori.affs.retardation then return "" end if ori.needLighting then prepend = prepend.."light pipes"..ori.settings.sep end
prepend = prepend..ori.ssc.balancefulChecks()
if ori.settings.autoMount and ori.autoMount and not ori.mounted and ori.mountHere() then prepend = prepend.."vault "..ori.mountHere()..ori.settings.sep end
return prepend end

Script.name: Mount stuff
Script.script:
ori.mounted = ori.mounted or false ori.urnMount = ori.urnMount
function ori.mountHere() if ori.roomItems[ori.urnMount] then return ori.urnMount end for _, mount in pairs(ori.settings.mountList) do if ori.roomItems[mount] then return mount end end return false end
local throttled = false function ori.tryToMount() if not throttled and ori.settings.autoMount and ori.autoMount and not ori.mounted and ori.mountHere() and ori.able.freestand() and not ori.affs.aeon and not ori.affs.retardation and ori.class()~="dragon" and not ori.class():find("elemental") then ori.send("vault "..ori.mountHere()) throttled = true tempTimer(1, function() throttled = false end) end end

Script.name: Heal to full then act
Script.script:
local action function ori.actOnFull(command) action = command ori.healAndAct() end
local sipthrottle, mossthrottle
function ori.healAndAct() if not action then return end local hp = ori.vitals.hp/ori.vitals.maxhp local mp = ori.vitals.mp/ori.vitals.maxmp if ori.bals.sip and not sipthrottle then if mp<1 and mp<hp then ori.send("sip mana") mp = mp+.12 sipthrottle = true tempTimer(1, function() sipthrottle = false end) elseif hp<1 then ori.send("sip health") hp = hp+.12 sipthrottle = true tempTimer(1, function() sipthrottle = false end) end end if ori.bals.moss and (hp<1 or mp<1) and not mossthrottle then local herb = "moss" if (ori.ssc.settings.transmutation and ori.rift.potash > 0) or (not ori.ssc.settings.transmutation and ori.rift.moss == 0) then herb = "potash" end ori.send("outr "..herb..ori.settings.sep.."eat "..herb) hp = hp+.08 mp = mp+.08 mossthrottle = true tempTimer(1, function() mossthrottle = false end) end if hp>=1 and mp>=1 and ori.bals.bal and ori.bals.eq then ori.echo("At full vitals. Now doing: "..action) expandAlias(action, false) action = nil end end

local arenas = { ["Matsuhaman Arena, the"] = true, ["Ainghaeal's Nest"] = true, ["Stadia Coronae, the"] = true, ["Theatrum Mortalis, the"] = true, ["Coloseum Diabolus, the"] = true, ["Collosea edn Duir, the"] = true, --pretty sure this is a typo so futureproofing and stuff ["Collosea en Duir, the"] = true, ["The Gauntlet"] = true, }

Script.name: lock check
Script.script: function ori.locked() if ori.affs.slickness and ori.affs.anorexia and ori.affs.asthma and ori.affs.paralysis and ori.affs.impatience then if ori.affs.disrupted and ori.affs.confusion then return "rekt" else return "true" end end if ori.affs.slickness and ori.affs.anorexia and ori.affs.asthma and ori.affs.impatience then return "hard" end if ori.affs.slickness and ori.affs.anorexia and ori.affs.asthma and ori.affs.paralysis then return "venom" end if ori.affs.slickness and ori.affs.anorexia and ori.affs.asthma then return "soft" end if ori.affs.slickness and ori.affs.asthma and not ori.able.rift() then return "rift" end return false end

Script.name: Class things
Magi
Firelord
Alchemist
Dor
Script.script:
ori.dor = ori.dor or {} ori.dor.doQueue = ori.dor.doQueue or {} ori.dor.doFreeQueue = ori.dor.doFreeQueue or {} ori.dor.repeating = ori.dor.repeating or false
local function checkEmpty(echoback) if #ori.dor.doQueue == 0 and ori.dor.repeating then ori.dor.repeating = false if echoback then ori.echo("The Do Queue is empty - Do Repeat <red>Disabled") end end end
function ori.dor.dor(command, echoback) --stuff to turn it off if you do DOR when it's enabled, or dor off. if not command or command == "off" then if ori.dor.repeating or command == "off" then ori.dor.repeating = false if echoback then ori.echo("Do-Repeat <red>disabled") end else if #ori.dor.doQueue > 0 then command = ori.dor.doQueue[1] ori.echof( "Do-Repeat <green>enabled<PowderBlue>; will repeat <DodgerBlue>%s<PowderBlue> forever.", command ) ori.dor.repeating = true else ori.echo("Sorry, there's nothing in the queue to repeat.") end end else --if that's not the case, turn dor on and add the command to the queue. ori.dor.repeating = true ori.dor.doQueue[1] = command if echoback then ori.echof( "Do-Repeat <green>enabled<PowderBlue>; will repeat <DodgerBlue>%s<PowderBlue> forever.", command ) end end raiseEvent("do changed") end
function ori.dor.doadd(command, echoback) ori.dor.doQueue[#ori.dor.doQueue + 1] = command if echoback then ori.echof("Added \"%s\" to the do queue.", command) end raiseEvent("do changed") end
function ori.dor.dofirst(command, echoback) table.insert(ori.dor.doQueue, 1, command) if echoback then ori.echof("Will do \"%s\" first.", command) end raiseEvent("do changed") end
function ori.dor.doaddfree(command, echoback) table.insert(ori.dor.doFreeQueue, command) if echoback then ori.echof("Added \"%s\" to the dofree queue.", command) end raiseEvent("dofree changed") end
function ori.dor.dofreefirst(command, echoback) table.insert(ori.dor.doFreeQueue, 1, command) if echoback then ori.echof("Will do \"%s\" first in dofree.", command) end raiseEvent("dofree changed") end
--functions for removing stuff from the queue
function ori.dor.undo(command, echoback) if command == "all" then return end if #ori.dor.doQueue == 0 then if echoback then ori.echo("The do queue is empty.") end return end if command then for i, entry in ipairs(ori.dor.doQueue) do if entry == command then table.remove(ori.dor.doQueue, i) if echoback then ori.echof("Removed \"%s\" from the do queue.", command) end checkEmpty(echoback) return end end if echoback then ori.echof("Don't have \"%s\" in the do queue.", command) end else local command = table.remove(ori.dor.doQueue, 1) if echoback then ori.echof("Removed \"%s\" from the do queue.", command) end checkEmpty(echoback) end raiseEvent("do changed") end
function ori.dor.undoall(echoback) ori.dor.repeating = false ori.dor.doQueue = {} if echoback then ori.echo("Do queue completely cleared.") end checkEmpty(echoback) raiseEvent("do changed") end
function ori.dor.undofree(what, echoback) local command = table.remove(ori.dor.doQueue, 1) if echoback then end raiseEvent("dofree changed") end
function ori.dor.undoallfree(echoback) ori.dor.doFreeQueue = {} if echoback then ori.echo("DoFree queue completely cleared.") end raiseEvent("dofree changed") end
--display the do queue
function ori.dor.pause(bool, echoback) if bool then if echoback then ori.echo("Paused the do queue") end ori.dor.paused = true else if echoback then ori.echo("Resumed the do queue") end ori.dor.paused = false ori.dor.doStuff() end end
function ori.dor.doshow() ori.echo( "We are currently " .. (ori.dor.repeating and "<DodgerBlue>repeating" or "<red>NOT repeating") .. " <PowderBlue>actions" ) ori.echo("Actions left in the Do queue:<DodgerBlue> " .. table.concat(ori.dor.doQueue, ", ")) ori.echo("Actions left in the Do Free queue:<DodgerBlue> " .. table.concat(ori.dor.doFreeQueue, ", ")) end
local throttle = false local throttleTimer local fullBalance = true function ori.dor.run() if not ori.dor.paused and ori.bals.bal and ori.bals.eq and (not ori.fullBalance or not throttle) then if #ori.dor.doFreeQueue > 0 then for i, command in pairs(ori.dor.doFreeQueue) do ori.send(command) end ori.dor.doFreeQueue = {} end if #ori.dor.doQueue > 0 then ori.send(ori.dor.doQueue[1]) if not ori.dor.repeating then table.remove(ori.dor.doQueue, 1) end throttle = true if throttleTimer then killTimer(throttleTimer) end throttleTimer = tempTimer(1, function() throttle = false ori.dor.run() end) end end ori.fullBalance = ori.bals.bal and ori.bals.eq end registerAnonymousEventHandler("do changed", "ori.dor.run") registerAnonymousEventHandler("dofree changed", "ori.dor.run")

Script.name: Class detection
Script.script:
ori.pvp = ori.pvp or {} local function blankEntry() return {class = "none", spec = "none", classHistory = {}, specHistory = {}, } end
ori.pvp.classData = ori.pvp.classData or {}
function ori.pvp.classDetect(person, class) if not ori.pvp.classData[person] then ori.pvp.classData[person] = blankEntry() end local entry = ori.pvp.classData[person] --prune old records local classHistory = {} for _, record in ipairs(entry.classHistory) do if record.time>os.clock()-90 and #classHistory<6 then table.insert(classHistory, record) end end entry.classHistory = classHistory table.insert(entry.classHistory, 1, {class = class, time = os.clock()}) local maxCount = 0 local maxClass = "none" local counts = {} for _, record in pairs(entry.classHistory) do counts[record.class] = (counts[record.class] or 0) + 1 if counts[record.class]>maxCount then maxClass = record.class maxCount = counts[record.class] end end if maxClass~= entry.class then ori.echo("Assuming "..person.."'s class is "..maxClass) entry.class = maxClass end end
function ori.pvp.specDetect(person, spec) if not ori.pvp.classData[person] then ori.pvp.classData[person] = blankEntry() end local entry = ori.pvp.classData[person]
if not ori.pvp.classData[person] then ori.pvp.classData[person] = blankEntry() end local entry = ori.pvp.classData[person] --prune old records local specHistory = {} for _, record in ipairs(entry.specHistory) do if record.time>os.clock()-90 then table.insert(specHistory, record) end end entry.specHistory = specHistory table.insert(entry.specHistory, 1, {spec = spec, time = os.clock()}) local maxCount = 0 local maxSpec = "none" local counts = {} for _, record in pairs(entry.specHistory) do counts[record.spec] = (counts[record.spec] or 0) + 1 if counts[record.spec]>maxCount then maxSpec = record.spec maxCount = counts[record.spec] end end if maxSpec~= entry.spec then ori.echo("Assuming "..person.."'s specialization is "..maxSpec) entry.spec = maxSpec end end
function ori.pvp.getClass(person) local person = person:lower():title() if ori.pvp.classData[person] then return ori.pvp.classData[person].class else return "none" end end
function ori.pvp.getSpec(person) local person = person:lower():title() if ori.pvp.classData[person] then return ori.pvp.classData[person].spec else return "none" end end
